---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
books <- BX_Books %>%
  select(ISBN, `Book-Title`, `Book-Author`, Publisher, `Year-Of-Publication`)
rm(BX_Books)
users <- BX_Users %>% 
  mutate(Age = as.numeric(Age))
rm(BX_Users)
ratings <- BX_Book_Ratings %>%
  left_join(books)
rm(BX_Book_Ratings)
```

```{r}
ratings <- ratings %>% 
  filter(!is.na(`Book-Title`))

users <- users %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Age)) %>% 
  mutate(Country = str_remove(Location,".*,")) %>% 
  filter(Country != "")

all <-ratings %>% 
  left_join(users)%>% 
  select(-Location)
```

```{r}
write_csv(all, "all.csv")
```
